generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide, paved road with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz emblem in the foreground, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible on the left side of the road, walking on a designated pedestrian area, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and on the right side of the image, including a large brick building and a modern building with many windows.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in the background, providing greenery.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Numerous pedestrians are visible crossing the street and walking along the sidewalks.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: A white van and a black car are visible on the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, controlling the flow of traffic.
- traffic sign: A red circular "No Entry" sign is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible in the middle of the road, being ridden by a person.
